title: How to add the shortcut icon to desktop?
answer:
In the home screen,long press the blank area,pop-up the window of settingdesktop;Clicking window widgets,selecting a widget from the list in following, 

 dragging to the screen thumbnail which intend to add to and clicking ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111264) to return main screen. 

 ![](http://consumer.huawei.com/support/servlet/imageServlet?dlType=HtmlAreaImage&imageId=111265)

 Note: 

 The main screen need have enough blank area to place the window widgets.Ifthebkank area is not enough,your phone will add a new main menu automaticlyto place the window widgets.
